citations.narrative:
There was no official identification for 25 puppies in the whelping building. Official identification allows for the proper
tracking of movement of puppies. All puppies in the kennel must be officially identified with all required information
provided under paragraph 2.75(a)(1) of the Animal Welfare Act. Correct by 10 April 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There was no official identification for 25 puppies in the whelping building.  Official identification allows for the proper 
tracking of movement of puppies.  All puppies in the kennel must be officially identified with all required information 
provided under paragraph 2.75(a)(1) of the Animal Welfare Act.  Correct by 10 April 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
